name: Anian Ziegler
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I work as a full stack developer for a young startup in Augsburg. We develop a suit of webapps for the industry. I'm pretty new to the field of js development. I have been tinkering with it for some years but really started developing meaningful applications last year with Angular 2+ and NodeJS
what_can_i_contribute: I can share my experience of developing apps with Angular2+ & ngrx/store and hapi & objection.js on the backend. Furthermore I can talk about our challenges developing modern web applications for the industry with a small team of newcomers and external agencies
